channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Simon Fraser University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Data-Efficient Operator Learning via Unsupervised Pretraining and In-Context Learning
item.description: Data-efficient neural operator learning is achieved via unsupervised pretraining and in-context learning, significantly reducing simulation costs and improving generalization.

item.title: Optimal deep learning of holomorphic operators between Banach spaces
item.description: Deep learning optimally learns holomorphic operators between Banach spaces, achieving near-optimal generalization bounds with problem-agnostic DNN architectures.
